ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Task system
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t generally have lag issues.  I have a cable modem connection and I turn off some game options that would cause lag, like Spell Effects, full names, etc.
ygData.messageBody:
I don't generally have lag issues.  I have a cable modem connection and I turn off some game options that would cause lag, like Spell Effects, full names, etc.  And in some places, if necessary, I'll drop the clipp plane down a little.  So assumng I'm running at full speed with no lag, I still have a hard time soloing the tasks, even as a 64 druid, mainly because of miscellaneous aggro in close quarters.  Sure I can kite one or two mobs, but in close quarters, where adds are coming out of the woodwork, even greenies can beat you down.  I'm not big on soloing per se.  It takes too long and requires too much attention.  I prefer grouping anyway.  XP is much quicker, and in a full group that knows what they're doing, I only have to snare/dot once per round as opposed to 2 or 3 per (high level) mob.So I don't waste nearly as much mana meaning I can do other things like back up heal, buff sporadically, or be available to evac if necessary. 
 
I understand that some people are limited to what kind of connections they can get in certain geographical areas, but personally I don't think satellite is one of the best connections to play EQ.  You should try for an ISDN connection at least.  Connection would probably be more stable, and your uplink would be roughly same speed as your downlink.
 
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, September 29, 2004 8:56 AM
Subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Task system

Well, certain classes are able to solo mobs. I think skill is not the only issue. It's also a matter of gear, class, and internet connection. Classes with pets, slows, and snares have an advantage. Sure clerics can heal themselves, but only if they don't get interrupted. Since omens came out I have been fizzling a LOT more for no reason. Plus I have satellite internet which causes some upload latency. The way the damage system is setup I get damage misreports and take 100+ damage from an 18 damage hit. I was nearly owned by green mobs in straightup melee even with haste and a delay 18 weapon with a proc. My spells were interrupted, I lagged and couldn't get other spells off, and root was breaking instantly. I was told that if I had ornate or elemental armor I would have a better chance soloing.
I just wish they had tasks categorized as easy, medium, and difficult, as well as short, medium, etc..
Zoning can take a long time for me so running from DL to Sebilis can take more time than I want to spend doing a task.
I agree that it would be nice to get a more tangible reward.
-Su
